snippet: Jennifer Carroll’s tenure has been marred by scandal and poor judgment, and she was increasingly viewed as an embarrassment to Gov. Rick Scott.
abstract: Florida Lieutenant Gov Jennifer Carroll abruptly resigns as result of criminal investigation into Internet sweepstakes company for which she once served as consultant.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE JORDAN SEXTON and LIZETTE ALVAREZ
byline.contributor: Christine Jordan Sexton reported from Tallahassee, and Lizette Alvarez from West Palm Beach, Fla.

lead_paragraph: Jennifer Carroll’s tenure has been marred by scandal and poor judgment, and she was increasingly viewed as an embarrassment to Gov. Rick Scott.

headline.seo: Lt. Gov. Jennifer Carroll of Florida Resigns
headline.main: Florida’s Lieutenant Governor Resigns Amid Inquiry Into Sweepstakes Firm
headline.print_headline: Florida’s Lieutenant Governor Resigns Amid Inquiry Into Sweepstakes Firm
